description.content: Inspirational quotes feel trite, cliche, and repetitive. There is no option to add your own.
Additional Resources relists the same support groups listed in the "Popular Support Groups" section. This is superflous. Furthermore, the trashcan icons are non-functional.

todo.title: Remove Redudancies on Community Support Page

description.content: Ensure that there are appropriate visual elements called to each screen where placemarkers currently exist.
New notifications should overwrite previous ones or add on top of.
If user has not logged in after more than 24 hours hours, prompt check-in at startup.

details.content: Overlays any existing visual element. If the phone is off, or locked, an alarm goes off similar to how the phone's alarm or timer would go off. User must turn it off by completing their check-in. The extent to which this check-in and related notifications are intentionally annoying can be configured by the user in the settings, but by default, they are set to the most obnoxious settings.
